A

Accessory - Class in model
The Accessory class is a sublclass of the Item class.
Accessory() - Constructor for class model.Accessory
Default constructor for the Accessory class
Accessory(int, String, String, double, int, String) - Constructor for class model.Accessory
Constructor used for creating an Accessory Object for RETRIEVAL operations hence, the inclusion of itemID
Accessory(String, String, double, int, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Accessory
Constructor used for creating an Accessory Object for INSERTION operations hence, the absence of itemID
AccessoryCrud - Class in crud
The AccessoryCrud class provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete) operations in the Product Table Specifically, this class provides methods for Products of type Accessory
AccessoryCrud() - Constructor for class crud.AccessoryCrud
Constructs an AccessoryCrud object which initialises the database connection via its superclass
Account - Class in model
The Account class holds all information relative to each Customers account This class has an aggregational relationship with the Address class, where the Address is a part of the Account, and may also exist independently of the Account The Account class stores the email, address, password and phone number of a Customer
Account(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Account
Constructor used for creating an Account Object for RETRIEVAL Creates the Account using the Address class
Account(String, String, String, Address) - Constructor for class model.Account
Constructor used for creating an Account Object for INSERTION Creates the Account using the Address class
AccountCreationException - Exception Class in controller
Custom exception thrown when an account creation fails due to some invalid data or error.
AccountCreationException() - Constructor for exception class controller.AccountCreationException
Default Constructor for AccountCreationException
AccountCreationException(String) - Constructor for exception class controller.AccountCreationException
Constructs a new AccountCreatioNException with a more detailed error message
AccountEditException - Exception Class in controller
Custom exception thrown when an account creation fails due to some invalid data or error.
AccountEditException() - Constructor for exception class controller.AccountEditException
Default Constructor for AccountEditException
AccountEditException(String) - Constructor for exception class controller.AccountEditException
Constructs a new AccountEditException with a more detailed error message
addItem(Item, int) - Method in class model.Cart
Adds an item to the cart First, the method checks if the Item being added is already in the Customer's cart or if the Item needs to be added freshly to the cart
Address - Class in model
The Address class holds all information relative to each Customers Address The Address class stores the town, city, county, eircode and country for each Customer
Address(String) - Constructor for class model.Address
Constructor used for creating an Address Object for RETRIEVAL of CUSTOMERS The town attribute gets assigned the full concatenated Address retrieved from DB
Address(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Address
Constructor used for creating an Address Object for INSERTION
